attributes.name: name
attributes.description: A name for the search query.

attributes.name: collection
attributes.description:
The logical collection name that is the target of the search operation or an external collection
		with fully qualified path.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Specifies the criteria type for the search.

attributes.name: criteria
attributes.description: Specifies the criteria for the search following the syntactic rules specified by type.

attributes.name: maxRows
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of entries for index queries. If omitted, all rows are returned.

attributes.name: startRow
attributes.description: Specifies the first row number to be retrieved. Default is 1.

attributes.name: external
attributes.description: This attribute has been deprecated and is non-functional.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Deprecated. This attribute is now ignored and the language of the collection is used to perform the search.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description:
A list of categories, separated by commas, to which
            the search is limited. If specified, and the collection
            does not have categories enabled, Lucee

            throws an exception.

attributes.name: categoryTree
attributes.description:
The location in a hierarchical category tree at which
            to start the search. Lucee searches at and
            below this level. If specified, and the collection does
            not have categories enabled, Lucee throws an
            exception. Can be used in addition to category
            attribute.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Specifies the name of the structure variable into
            which Lucee places search information, including
            alternative criteria suggestions (spelling corrections).

attributes.name: suggestions
attributes.description:
Specifies whether Lucene returns spelling suggestions
            for possibly misspelled words.

attributes.name: contextPassages
attributes.description:
The number of passages/sentences Lucene returns in
            the context summary (that is, the context column of
            the results).
            Default: 3

attributes.name: contextBytes
attributes.description:
The maximum number of bytes Lucene returns in the
            context summary.
            Default: 300

attributes.name: contextHighlightBegin
attributes.description:
The HTML to prepend to search terms in the context
            summary. Use this attribute in conjunction with
            contextHighlightEnd to highlight search terms in the
            context summary.
            Default: <b>

attributes.name: contextHighlightEnd
attributes.description: The HTML to prepend to search terms in the context summary. Use this attribute in conjunction with contextHighlightEnd to highlight search terms in the context summary. Default:

attributes.name: previousCriteria
attributes.description:
The name of a result set from an existing set of search
            results. Lucene searches the result set for criteria
            without regard to the previous search score or rank.
            Use this attribute to implement searching within result
            sets.
